p: Two weeks to one month before the CBL session, the participants will receive an email with a link to the three questionnaires (AITCS, RIPLS and SAQ) generated in the secure web application REDCap [ 16]. A follow-up questionnaire will be sent to the participants 1-3 months after the intervention with a link to the same three questionnaires (see Fig. 3 for Timepoints of measurements).
